scripts.dev-install: (cd api && npm install) & (cd app && npm install)
scripts.start-dev: NODE_ENV=development && (cd api && npm run dev) & (cd app && npm run dev)
scripts.build: ((cd app && npm run build) & (cd api && npm run build)) && npm run build-only
scripts.install-stage: rm -r install-stage && cp -r dist install-stage && pm2 restart stage
scripts.install-prod: rm -r install-prod && cp -r dist install-prod && pm2 restart prod
scripts.prebuild-only: cd build-helpers && npm run build && npm install
